edu.iit.ir.simpledm.data
Class CategoricalAttributeValue

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.data.AttributeValue
        |
        +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.data.CategoricalAttributeValue
public class CategoricalAttributeValue
extends AttributeValue

Represents a categorical attribute value. Categorical values are represented by a String that is the name of value for that category. An integer can also be assigned to represent the category along with the actual String.

setOrdinal

public void setOrdinal(boolean ordinal)
Set the type of attribute as ordinal. This method will be called by K-Menas algorithm.

Parameters:
ordinal - - boolean value which represents if ordirnal type should be concerned or not.
